p: A real time PCR monoplex reaction that target the L1 open reading frame of HPV was performed using the GP5+/6+ consensus primers pairs (GP5+ primer: 5′-TTTGTTACTGTGGTAGATACTAC-3′ and GP6+ primer 5′-GAAAAATAAACTGTAAATCATATTC-3′) [ 15]. A universal taqman MGB probe was designed and used for this study: 5′- FAM-CATGNNGARGAATATG-MGB-3′. The PCR reaction was done using Platinum Quantitative PCR SuperMix-UDG as previously described.
